summary.span: 表示承载快速访问工具栏、应用程序菜单和选项卡的功能区用户界面的根元素。

span.span: Represents the root element of a ribbon user interface that hosts a Quick Access Toolbar, Application Menu, and tabs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能区是组织为一系列应用程序窗口顶部的选项卡的应用程序的功能的命令栏。A ribbon is a command bar that organizes the features of an application into a series of tabs at the top of the application window. 它将替换传统的菜单栏和工具栏。It replaces both the traditional menu bar and toolbars. 类是功能区用户界面 (UI) 中 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 的根元素。The class is the root element of a ribbon user interface (UI) in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF). 类承载、 ，和一个或多个控件。The class hosts a , a , and one or more controls. 这些控件然后承载各种启用应用程序命令的访问的按钮和菜单控件。These controls then host a variety of button and menu controls that enable access to application commands. 以下列表显示功能区元素的典型层次结构。The following list shows the typical hierarchy of ribbon elements. - - - - , , , , , , , , - , , , , - - - - - - - - - , , , , , , , , - , , , , - ## Examples 下面的示例演示了由 Visual Studio 2010 模板中的与帮助窗格和快速访问工具栏添加的元素，创建简单的功能区。The following example shows a simple ribbon that is created by the Visual Studio 2010 template, with help pane and Quick Access Toolbar elements added. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#RibbonDefault](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbondefault)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用*上下文选项卡*用于显示组的相关仅在特定上下文中的命令。You use a *contextual tab* to display groups of commands that are relevant only in a particular context. 上下文选项卡组是显示还是隐藏基于指定的条件。Contextual tab groups are shown or hidden based on specified criteria. 例如，当检测到平板电脑输入，或可能选定映像对象时显示的图片工具选项卡组，则可能显示墨迹工具选项卡组。For example, an Ink Tools tab group might be shown when tablet input is detected, or a Picture Tools tab group might be shown when an Image object is selected. ## Examples 下面的示例演示名为**钢笔**，位于**墨迹工具**上下文选项卡组。The following example shows a named **Pens** that is in the **Ink Tools** contextual tab group. ```xaml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以设置帮助窗格，以使用户能够访问你的应用程序的帮助内容的内容。You can set the contents of the help pane to enable users to access help content for your application. 通常将设置属性设置为一个按钮，启动单独帮助窗口。You will typically set the property to a single button that launches a separate help window. 但是，你可以定义了在帮助窗格中的任何内容。However, you can define any content to go in the help pane. 可以通过设置中指定的布局和内容的外观属性。You can specify the layout and appearance of the content by setting the property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序窗口调整大小时，并且没有足够的空间来显示功能区中有意义的方式，功能区将自动折叠。The ribbon collapses automatically when the application window is resized and does not have enough space to display the ribbon in a meaningful way. 功能区折叠时，从视图中隐藏所有功能区元素。When the ribbon is collapsed, all ribbon elements are hidden from view. 功能区折叠时，事件发生。When the ribbon is collapsed, the event occurs. 当扩展功能区时，事件发生。When the ribbon is expanded, the event occurs. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the drop-down for a is open.

value.span: 如果 下拉列表已打开，则为 ；否则为。

span.span: if the drop-down for a is open; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，快速访问工具栏、 应用程序菜单和选项卡标题会显示，但选项卡的内容放在下拉列表，并默认情况下不显示。When the property is `true`, the Quick Access Toolbar, Application Menu, and tab headers are shown, but the tab contents are put in a drop-down and are not shown by default. 当用户选择的选项卡标头时，打开选项卡的下拉列表，显示其内容。When a user selects a tab header, the drop-down for the tab is opened and its contents are shown. 选中或取消选中该选项卡标头将依次切换属性之间`true`和`false`。Selecting or deselecting the tab header toggles the property between `true` and `false`. 如果属性是`false`、属性也为`false`。If the property is `false`, the property is also `false`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以通过最小化功能区中右键单击功能区并选择**最小化功能区**从上下文菜单。A user can minimize the ribbon by right-clicking the ribbon and selecting **Minimize the Ribbon** from the context menu. 当属性是`true`，快速访问工具栏、 应用程序菜单和选项卡标题会显示，但选项卡的内容放在下拉列表，并默认情况下不显示。When the property is `true`, the Quick Access Toolbar, Application Menu, and tab headers are shown, but the tab contents are put in a drop-down and are not shown by default. 当用户选择的选项卡标头时，打开选项卡的下拉列表，显示其内容。When a user selects a tab header, the drop-down for the tab is opened and its contents are shown. 如果属性是`true`、 选择或取消选中该选项卡标头将依次切换属性之间`true`和`false`。If the property is `true`, selecting or deselecting the tab header toggles the property between `true` and `false`. 如果属性是`false`、属性也为`false`。If the property is `false`, the property is also `false`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
